column3:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander is asking Mutamix to shifty-make? Uplander should be hand-swapping five pieces of need-not materia with Mutamix.
Mixy-melt, melty-mix, squash and squeeze, squeeze and squash...
Bigeyes! Five need-not are reborn as one!
Materia reborn glows with much brightshine. For uplander, this is happy-day!
Shifty-making is exciting chance-game, yes? Even Mutamix has no knowings of what reborn materia will be! Does uplander's heart not be all flutterdance?
Shkohhh? Uplanderbag is clutterfull! Mutamix cannot shifty-make if uplander cannot carry materia reborn!
